title: Toolchain Profiles
description: Manage build toolchain profiles for distribution compilation
emptyDescription: Create a toolchain profile to define reusable build toolchain configurations.

description.label: Description
description.description: Optional description of the toolchain profile

extraEnv.label: Extra Environment Variables
extraEnv.description: Additional environment variables passed to make (KEY=VALUE per line, optional)

compilerFlags.label: Compiler Flags
compilerFlags.description: Extra CFLAGS/LDFLAGS to pass to the compiler (optional)

delete.title: Delete Toolchain Profile
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the toolchain profile "{{ name }}"? This action cannot be undone.
delete.systemError: System toolchain profiles cannot be deleted.
